mapper.select: SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", CH.category_id AS "ChildCategoryId", CH.name AS "ChildCategoryName", GCH.category_id AS "GrandChildrenCategoryId", GCH.name AS "GrandChildrenCategoryName" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS CH on (C.category_id = CH.parent_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS GCH on (CH.category_id = GCH.parent_id) ORDER BY C.category_id ASC

SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", CH.category_id AS "ChildCategoryId", CH.name AS "ChildCategoryName", GCH.category_id AS "GrandChildrenCategoryId", GCH.name AS "GrandChildrenCategoryName" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS CH on (C.category_id = CH.parent_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS GCH on (CH.category_id = GCH.parent_id) WHERE C.parent_id IS null ORDER BY C.category_id ASC
SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo" FROM category AS C WHERE parent_id IS null ORDER BY C.category_id ASC

SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", CH.category_id AS "ChildCategoryId", CH.name AS "ChildCategoryName", CH.memo AS "ChildCategoryMemo" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS CH on (C.category_id = CH.parent_id) WHERE C.parent_id = #{id} ORDER BY C.category_id ASC

SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", PC.category_id AS "ParentCategoryId", PC.name AS "ParentCategoryName", PC.memo AS "ParentCategoryMemo", GPC.category_id AS "GrandParentCategoryId", GPC.name AS "GrandParentCategoryName", GPC.memo AS "GrandParentCategoryMemo" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS PC on (C.parent_id = PC.category_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS GPC on (PC.parent_id = GPC.category_id) WHERE C.category_id = #{id}

SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", C.en_name AS "CategoryEnName", CH.category_id AS "ChildCategoryId", CH.name AS "ChildCategoryName", CH.en_name AS "ChildCategoryEnName", GCH.category_id AS "GrandChildrenCategoryId", GCH.name AS "GrandChildrenCategoryName" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS CH on (C.category_id = CH.parent_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS GCH on (CH.category_id = GCH.parent_id) WHERE C.category_id = #{id}

SELECT C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName", C.memo AS "CategoryMemo", CH.category_id AS "ChildCategoryId", CH.name AS "ChildCategoryName" FROM category AS C LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS CH on (C.category_id = CH.parent_id) WHERE C.en_name = #{name}
